trans-unit.source: Represents the exception that is thrown when incorrectly trying to create or access a relation.
trans-unit.target: 表示錯誤嘗試建立或存取關聯時所擲回的例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.InvalidConstraintException> is thrown when incorrectly invoking the following methods while trying to create or access a relation.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.InvalidConstraintException>不正確地嘗試建立或存取關聯時叫用下列方法時擲回。

trans-unit.source: If you call <xref:System.Data.DataRelationCollection.Add%2A>, the <xref:System.Data.InvalidConstraintException> may be thrown if a relation cannot be created based on the values supplied in the parameters.
trans-unit.target: 如果您呼叫<xref:System.Data.DataRelationCollection.Add%2A>、<xref:System.Data.InvalidConstraintException>無法根據參數中提供的值建立關聯時可能會擲回。

trans-unit.source: If you call <xref:System.Data.DataRowCollection.Clear%2A>, the <xref:System.Data.InvalidConstraintException> may be thrown if a <xref:System.Data.ForeignKeyConstraint> is enforced on the <xref:System.Data.DataRowCollection>.
trans-unit.target: 如果您呼叫<xref:System.Data.DataRowCollection.Clear%2A>、<xref:System.Data.InvalidConstraintException>如果可能擲回<xref:System.Data.ForeignKeyConstraint>上是否強制執行<xref:System.Data.DataRowCollection>。

trans-unit.source: If you call <xref:System.Data.DataRow.GetParentRow%2A>, the <xref:System.Data.InvalidConstraintException> may be thrown if the columns have different data types or the tables do not belong to the same <xref:System.Data.DataSet>.
trans-unit.target: 如果您呼叫<xref:System.Data.DataRow.GetParentRow%2A>、<xref:System.Data.InvalidConstraintException>可能擲回，如果資料行具有不同的資料類型，或者資料表不屬於相同<xref:System.Data.DataSet>。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Data.InvalidConstraintException" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Data.InvalidConstraintException" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Data.InvalidConstraintException" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Data.InvalidConstraintException" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The string to display when the exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 例外狀況擲回時要顯示的字串。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Data.InvalidConstraintException" /> class with the specified string.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的字串，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Data.InvalidConstraintException" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The data that is required to serialize or deserialize an object.
trans-unit.target: 序列化或還原序列化物件所需要的資料。

trans-unit.source: Description of the source and destination of the specified serialized stream.
trans-unit.target: 來源的描述和指定的序列化資料流的目的端。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Data.InvalidConstraintException" /> class with serialization information.
trans-unit.target: 使用序列化資訊，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Data.InvalidConstraintException" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The error message that explains the reason for the exception.
trans-unit.target: 解釋例外狀況原因的錯誤訊息。

trans-unit.source: The exception that is the cause of the current exception, or a null reference (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic) if no inner exception is specified.
trans-unit.target: 造成目前例外狀況的例外狀況，若未指定內部例外狀況，則為 null 參考 (Visual Basic 中為 <see langword="Nothing" />)。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Data.InvalidConstraintException" /> class with a specified error message and a reference to the inner exception that is the cause of this exception.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的錯誤訊息以及造成此例外狀況的內部例外狀況的參考，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Data.InvalidConstraintException" /> 類別的新執行個體。
